item.title: Star Formation
item.description: Star Formation (MA) - Star Formation Course Star Formation (MA) Course No. Star Formation Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 2 3 WT Requirements: Preparation: Astrophysics I ( Astrophysics II recommended) Form of Testing and Examination: Oral examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Understanding of fundamental concepts of star formation in a variety of environments.
